QuestData.Title: Just To Be Sure
QuestData.Description:
Just... kill anyone who looks like they might be magically inclined. Or has organizational skills. Or looks overly ambitious.
Really, just use your best judgement on this one.
Your "best judgement" is to stop speaking to me? Come on, $c! They're... up to something nefarious, obviously!
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't they know they've been outwitted?
